Developer Terms of Use
des: Checkout Sonic Pay is an application for demonstrates the possibility of using ultrasounds to manage payments through the application created by CopSonic. This application will answer you if the simulation of a payment has been successful if it is detected by the CopSonic application or if it has failed if it cannot be detected.
